settings.title: Support Up to 300 LBS
settings.content: Due to its heavy-duty construction, our walking treadmill can withstand 300 LBS.

settings.title: Low Noise & Powerful motor
settings.content: Powerful motor allows you to exercise at any place without making loud noise.

settings.title: Space Saver & Easy to Move
settings.content: Two transport wheels allow you to move and carry easily.

• Multi-speed and LED display This desk treadmill is committed to providing users with a better exercise experience; We are committed to providing users with a safer and more scientific exercise speed with the treadmill desk, the speed range of the walking pad treadmill under desk is 0.6-3.8mph; There will be digital displays of speed, time, distance, and calories in the LED display of the star power under desk treadmill to help you better grasp the state of exercise;
  • Super Quiet and Powerful Motorc The 2.5HP desk treadmill for office under desk has a powerful motor with a weight capacity of 300lbs; The powerful motor of this walking treadmill under desk not only has a stable and high weight capacity but also can be ultra-quiet! You can exercise anywhere without making a lot of noise with the mini treadmill, and you can exercise anytime, anywhere at home or in the office without disturbing others when using this walking treadmill;

• Ultra-light and portable design This under-desk walking treadmill has a compact design, with an upgraded running belt, the body size is 16*40 inches, and the weight is only 44 pounds; both men and women can easily lift this walking machine; this running The pad adopts a slim and lightweight design, which can be easily placed in the wardrobe, under the sofa, under the bed, under the desk, with this under-desk treadmill, you can walk while working;
  • Installation-free and Easy to Move To provide users with a better experience, our treadmills for home products have been assembled when they arrive. They can be used directly after disassembly! The weight of this stand up desk treadmill is already so light, but in order to save time and effort for users during the movement, we have installed two wheels on the walking pad, you can store and move the treadmill for standing desk more easily;
  • 5-Layer Anti-Slip Design and Quality Assurance This office treadmill is committed to providing users with safer and more secure products and services; This running machine adopts a 5-layer anti-slip running belt design, which can enhance the safety of users during exercise; The portable treadmill under desk provide users with high-quality after-sales guarantee, if you have any problems during use, you can contact us and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution;

settings.text: Welcome to a better way to work

settings.content: We help you furnish an inspiring, supportive workspace without breaking the bank. Here's how:

settings.title: ERGONOMIC SUPPORT
settings.content: Designed to support you throughout the day, optimizing comfort and productivity

settings.title: FREE & FAST SHIPPING
settings.content: Free shipping on orders $90+ from a location near you, with all carbon emissions offset

settings.title: EASY ASSEMBLY
settings.content: Set up with ease. Our furniture can be assembled within your lunch break

settings.title: High-quality materials
settings.content: We use high-quality materials for our products
